modName: Blue Palace Beauties - A Bryling and Erdi Overhaul
summary: An overhaul for Bryling and Erdi.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿﻿﻿﻿[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/s0aj4up1x/Untitled_design_13.png[/img]﻿
[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/gjzithlmd/20180827151628_1.jpg[/img]﻿﻿

[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/y188276lx/Untitled_design_14.png[/img]
[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/plinkow11/image.png[/img]﻿
[color=#6d9eeb]
[/color][color=#c9daf8][size=5][b]Sybille[/b] is in my mod[i] Her Dark Deeds[/i], and Erdi is coming soon ;)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/93132][img]https://s33.postimg.cc/kramw5v67/Untitled_design_20.png[/img][/url]﻿﻿[/size]
[/color]
﻿﻿


﻿[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/ub8l8wphx/Untitled_design_15.png[/img]﻿
[color=#cfe2f3]
[/color][color=#cfe2f3][size=3]Click on which of the two are sufferring from a seam, type 'setnpcweight' and then their weight next to the aforementioned command.

Bryling's weight = 65
Erdi's weight = 40

So, if it was Erdi, type 'setnpcweight 40' while Erdi is clicked on.

Then, type 'disable' then 'enable'. [/size][/color]﻿[/center][center][img]https://s8.postimg.cc/by7zym291/Untitled_design_19.png[/img]﻿
[img]https://s8.postimg.cc/3spy0me1x/20180827151344_1.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]
author: Raye
